books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: The New York detective Michael Bennett enlists the help of a former colleague to solve a rash of horrifying crimes that are throwing the city into chaos.
books.name: TICK TOCK

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: A woman who survived a horrible childhood abduction may have tricked the Massachusetts police sniper Bobby Dodge into killing her husband.
books.name: ALONE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier; the first volume in the Millennium trilogy.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Deborah Harkness
books.description: The recovery of a lost ancient manuscript in a library at Oxford sets a fantastical underworld stirring.
books.name: A DISCOVERY OF WITCHES

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: The third volume of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In the second volume of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Twin brothers, conjoined at birth and then separated, grow up amid the political turmoil of Ethiopia.
books.name: CUTTING FOR STONE

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A criminal wants to save an innocent man on death row, but he must convince the authorities he’s telling the truth.
books.name: THE CONFESSION

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Grant Blackwood
books.description: Familiar Clancy characters appear as an intelligence group tracks a vicious terrorist called the Emir.
books.name: DEAD OR ALIVE

books.author: by Emma Donoghue
books.description: The entire world of the 5-year-old boy who narrates this novel is the 11-by-11-foot room in which his mother is being held prisoner.
books.name: ROOM

books.author: by Susan Wiggs
books.description: A woman struggles for years to choose between two men. And then, one fateful day, the decision is made for her.
books.name: MARRYING DAISY BELLAMY

books.author: by Alex Berenson
books.description: When the king of Saudi Arabia is threatened, the former C.I.A. operative John Wells goes undercover to help.
books.name: THE SECRET SOLDIER

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: In the 19th Stone Barrington novel, the New York lawyer works with the C.I.A. to transport a fugitive.
books.name: STRATEGIC MOVES
